short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows help for the words you're missing in today's spelling bee.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows help for the words you're missing in today's NYT (New York Times) spelling bee. Integrates the day's hints directly into the spelling bee site, showing hints for the words you are missing.
